system.requirements:
Tier 3: Untouchable E.Adv, Warp Disruption, Willpower 55.
Aptitudes: Intelligence, Willpower
system.effect:
Those affected by the Warp Disruption Talent reduce their Psy Rating by 2 rather than 1. This talent can be purchased multiple times, each purchase reduces psy rating by a further 1. 
(EG: Warp Anathema (3) would reduce Psy rating within range by 4)
